author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
This course teaches you how to design AI systems with security in mind from day one. You'll learn how AI risks differ from traditional software, how to create effective threat models, and how to analyze real-world AI breaches. The curriculum covers input manipulation, data output concerns, and practical defenses against emerging AI threats.

Robert Herbig from APIsec University created this course. 

Access the course with certificate here: https://www.apisecuniversity.com/courses/building-security-into-ai

Modules:
- Introduction to Building Security into AI
- Threat Model
- Input Manipulation
- Data Output Concerns


❤️ Support for this channel comes from our friends at Scrimba – the coding platform that's reinvented interactive learning: https://scrimba.com/freecodecamp
